SEARCH
Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.demo.model.Model
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Model extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the model of the game. It contains all the logic of the game. It is responsible for managing the players, the game status, the chat, the game board, and the game cards. It also manages the connection and disconnection of players, the game status, and the game logic. It notifies the listeners about the game state changes.
See Also:

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player p)
      Adds a new player to the game. Recall that if a player was previously playing, then we are able to retrieve him/her from the auxiliary ordered list. Thus, this method is meant as an adder of new players, not as an adder of disconnected players. Statical offer.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(Player p)
      Removes the player with the specified nickname from the game. It is meant as a brute force routine, because in general a player is only disconnected, not removed from the game.
      Parameters:
      p - The nickname of the player to remove.

    • getChat

      public Chat getChat()
      getter for the chat
      Returns:
      the chat

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String nick, Message message) throws ActionPerformedByAPlayerNotPlayingException
      Sends a message to the chat.
      Parameters:
      nick - nickname of the player sending the message
      message - the message to send
      Throws:
      ActionPerformedByAPlayerNotPlayingException - If the player is not connected to the game.

    • getGameId

      public int getGameId()
      Gets the game id
      Returns:
      gameId

    • getStatus

      public GameStatus getStatus()
      Gets the game status
      Returns:
      the game status

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(GameStatus status)
      Sets the status of the game and notifies listeners accordingly.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to be set for the game.
      Throws:
      NotReadyToRunException - If attempting to set the game status to "RUNNING" but the lobby does not have at least the minimum number of players or the current player index is not set.

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame()
      initialize the game calling the respective method in common_board. It may be helpful whenever we need to use a certain constructor of this class instead of another.

    • chooseCardFromHand

      public void chooseCardFromHand(Player p, int which_card)
      Choose the game card from the hand of the player.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who is choosing the game card.
      which_card - The index of the card in the player's hand.

    • dealCards

      public void dealCards()
      Deals cards to players from the common board's decks. Each player receives: - 1 starter card from the starter deck - 2 resource cards from the resource deck - 1 gold card from the gold deck - 2 secret objective cards from the objective deck

    • placeStarterCard

      public void placeStarterCard(Player p, Orientation o) throws GameEndedException
      Place the starter card of the player p on the board.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who is placing the starter card.
      o - The orientation of the starter card.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - If the game has already ended.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(ResourceCard card_chosen, Player p, int x, int y) throws GameEndedException
      Place a ** Resource ** card on the board.
      Parameters:
      card_chosen - The card to place.
      p - The player who is placing the card.
      x - The x-coordinate of the cell where the card is to be placed.
      y - The y-coordinate of the cell where the card is to be placed.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - If the game has already ended.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(GoldCard card_chosen, Player p, int x, int y) throws GameEndedException
      Place a ** Gold ** card on the board.
      Parameters:
      card_chosen - The card to place.
      p - The player who is placing the card.
      x - The x-coordinate of the cell where the card is to be placed.
      y - The y-coordinate of the cell where the card is to be placed.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - If the game has already ended.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Player p, int index) throws GameEndedException
      Draw a card based on the provided index on the board (by the socket)
      Parameters:
      index - The index indicating which card to draw: 1: Resource Deck 2: First Resource Card on the table 3: Second Resource Card on the table 4: Gold Deck 5: First Gold Card on the table 6: Second Gold Card on the table
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the index is less than 1 or greater than 6.
      GameEndedException

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn() throws GameEndedException, GameNotStartedException
      Proceeds to the next turn of the game. Throws a GameEndedException if the game has already ended or a GameNotStartedException if the game has not yet started.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - If the game has already ended.
      GameNotStartedException - If the game has not yet started.

    • calculateFinalScores

      public void calculateFinalScores()
      Calculates the final scores for all players based on their personal boards, chosen objective cards, and common objectives. Updates the final scores for each player and stores them in the final_scores array.

    • declareWinners

      public void declareWinners()
      Calculates the winner(s) of the game based on final scores. Updates the leaderboard and the list of winners accordingly. It is called by getWinners() method.

    • showOthersPersonalBoard

      public void showOthersPersonalBoard(String playerNickname, int playerIndex)
      show the personal board of the player with the nickname
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - nickname of the player
      playerIndex - index of the player

      Returns:
      the leaderboard
